title: Aphrodisiac Valentine's Day Dinner
description:
Indulge in a 6 course dinner designed to stimuate love on the most romantic day of the year. Each course will be perfectly paired with wine from Dutton Goldfield Winery while you enjoy a beautiful ambience created by violinist Donna Fraser.

$95 per person includes dinner plus long stem roses, chocolates and entry into a hotel room giveaway.

If you make your reservation before January 21st, you'll receive 20% off room accomdations and complimentary valet.
button_text:
Seating is limited and reservations are required.

Call -
